entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 8:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
